_documentation.name: The name of the NFT collection displayed on marketplaces
_documentation.chainId: The blockchain network ID (137 for Polygon)
_documentation.maxMintableSupply: Array of maximum supply limits for each token ID
_documentation.globalWalletLimit: Array of maximum tokens that can be minted per wallet across all stages, per token ID
_documentation.mintCurrency: Token address used for payment (zero address for native currency)
_documentation.fundReceiver: Wallet address that receives the mint payments
_documentation.royaltyReceiver: Wallet address that receives royalties from secondary sales
_documentation.royaltyFee: Percentage of secondary sales paid as royalties (in basis points, e.g., 0 = 0%)
_documentation.mintable: Whether minting is enabled or disabled
_documentation.cosigner: Address of the wallet authorized to sign mint transactions (zero address if unused)

stages._description: Array of mint stages with different conditions
stages.price: Array of prices per token ID in native currency
stages.mintFee: Array of additional fees per mint transaction per token ID
stages.walletLimit: Array of maximum tokens that can be minted per wallet in this stage, per token ID
stages.maxStageSupply: Array of maximum tokens that can be minted in this stage per token ID (optional)
stages.startDate: UTC timestamp when the stage begins
stages.endDate: UTC timestamp when the stage ends

deployment.initial_owner: Initial owner/admin of the smart contract
